reviewText: not what I expected not enough video video during 1966
Great video, I was there in 1969 with 9th avn bn, B company Sting Rays
It wasn't as good as I would have liked I was stationed at Dong Tam and it really didn't give you as much about the base as I would have likes but it was fine.

I was  with 9th Div.during TET in 1968 when Divisions of N.V.A and V.C came into Dong Tam, Bear Cat, SAIGON and many others. They were turned back @ every location by all our joined troops. Just remember we won the battles but our nation did not back us up.
